message: And then, just like that, everything is back to normal. Conversation washes over me. The world stops spinning. My feet move as they always have.
A guard points from the far end of the ballroom.
Right. I have to find Ren and get out of here.
I push my way through the confused guests, keeping a close eye on my feet.
The guests part, trying to avoid me, and a path opens through the crowd.
And that's when I see a small blue shape scamper by.
But just then, several guards appear in Ren's path.
One guard's foot lashes out as Ren tries to escape. I hear a dull thwack and see his round body bounce across the floor.
I dash to his side and scoop him up. The guards surround us with their guns drawn.

name: 警備Ａ
message: "Wait! Our orders are to capture him alive."
The guards holster their guns and grab my arms.
I clutch Ren tight to my chest, trying to protect him as I struggle to escape.
And then, suddenly, a searing heat flares inside my brain.
Feels like it's gonna split open...!
